messages.message:
When indexing fails I’m stuck with this modal and have no way to dismiss/navigate away

This is on https://aihub-sandbox.internal.instabase.com/
I can reproduce this issue. We can target to close this for 24.12. @Kerry let me know if we want to bump the priority on this one
this seems like a critical failure as the user will get stuck here; if this is in 24.10, we need to fix this with urgency (if not, can wait until 24.12)

I tested in UAT & prod, I am not able to reproduce this behaviour. So, it looks like, this is introduced recently (reproducible in sandbox). We will try to fix this before 24.12 code cut

Further more, there is a variation of this in build app too.  If a corrupt file is uploaded in build app, it goes into a multiple retries and ends up with the same state as converse
cc: @Arjun
can you share the corrupt file so I can test?
renaming `jpgs` as `pdfs`  should corrupt the file.
